title: Peppermint chocolate chip cookies
ingredients: ['300g caster sugar', '225g butter, softened', '2 eggs', '1 egg yolk', '10 drops green food colouring', '1 teaspoon peppermint extract', '400g plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon cream of tartar', '1/2 teaspoon coarse sea salt, or to taste', '350g dark chocolate chips']
